snippet: The remarks were the first official statements from Iran and Syria since Secretary of State John Kerry’s announcement that Washington would provide nonlethal aid directly to Syria’s rebels.
abstract: Foreign ministers of Syria and Iran harshly criticize United States over its decision to provide aid to rebels fighting to topple Pres Bashar al-Assad, saying that such assistance would only prolong conflict.
lead_paragraph: The remarks were the first official statements from Iran and Syria since Secretary of State John Kerry’s announcement that Washington would provide nonlethal aid directly to Syria’s rebels.

headline.seo: Iran and Syria Ministers Assail U.S. on Rebel Aid
headline.main: Syria and Iran Assail U.S. On Rebel Aid
headline.print_headline: Syria and Iran Assail U.S. On Rebel Aid
